1.description: Twinborn lawman who has settled into his role as a nobleman in Elendel while continuing to work with law enforcement on dangerous cases.

8.description: Continues to struggle with balancing his noble duties and his calling as a lawman, especially as the city faces increasing civil unrest.

20.description: Faces his greatest personal challenge yet as the investigation becomes deeply connected to his past and the nature of kandra.

1.description: Wax's loyal Twinborn partner, skilled with speed bubbles and healing. Continues his habit of 'borrowing' things while pursuing justice.

4.description: Proves instrumental in investigating the mysterious killings, using his street connections and investigative skills.

2.description: Now working as a constable in Elendel, having left her university studies to pursue law enforcement. Still developing her Allomantic abilities.

6.description: Takes on more responsibility in the investigation, proving herself as a capable detective and Allomancer.

3.description: Wax's practical and organized fiancée who continues to plan their wedding with meticulous attention to detail.

14.description: Shows increasing courage and independence as she becomes more involved in the dangerous investigations.

1.description: A mysterious killer who can apparently change appearance and has been assassinating key political figures in Elendel.

7.description: Demonstrated incredible abilities to mimic others perfectly and seems to have an agenda beyond simple murder.

17.description: Revealed to have a much more personal connection to the investigation than anyone suspected, with motives that run deep.

21.description: A kandra who has been living among humans, revealed to have deep connections to Wax's past in ways that change everything.

23.description: The shocking truth about her identity and her role in Wax's past is fully revealed, explaining her current motivations.

5.description: A young kandra who has taken human form and joins the investigation. Curious about human society and eager to help.

10.description: Proves herself valuable to the team with her shape-changing abilities and unique perspective on the case.

12.description: An ancient and respected kandra who provides crucial information about kandra history and their relationship with Harmony.

20.description: Reveals important truths about the current crisis and its connection to kandra nature and their service to their god.

24.description: Reveals the true scope of the crisis and the difficult choices that must be made to preserve the world's balance.

recaps.1: Senator Vindish is mysteriously murdered in a seemingly impossible way, with the killer appearing to change shape. Wax and Wayne are called to investigate what appears to be the work of a supernatural assassin targeting political figures in Elendel.
recaps.2: Wax meets with Governor Innate about the political assassinations while continuing to balance his noble duties and law enforcement work. Marasi, now working as a constable, joins the investigation team.
recaps.3: The team investigates the crime scene and discovers unusual evidence suggesting the killer can perfectly mimic other people. Wax discusses wedding plans with Steris while the mystery deepens.
recaps.4: Another political figure is killed in impossible circumstances. The investigation reveals the killer, dubbed 'Bleeder,' has abilities that seem to defy normal Allomantic or Feruchemical powers.
recaps.5: A kandra named MeLaan joins the investigation, revealing that kandra society is concerned about recent events. The team learns more about shapeshifting abilities and their limitations.
recaps.6: The investigation expands as more evidence points to the killer having intimate knowledge of their targets. Political tensions rise as fear spreads through Elendel's leadership.
recaps.7: Civil unrest begins to spread through the city as labor disputes coincide with the political assassinations. Wayne goes undercover to investigate connections between the violence and the murders.
recaps.8: The crisis deepens as both political assassinations and civil unrest threaten the stability of Elendel. Wax struggles with the increasing demands of maintaining order.
recaps.9: Bleeder strikes again, demonstrating even more impossible abilities. The team realizes they're dealing with something far more dangerous than a normal criminal.
recaps.10: Religious and political tensions escalate as various groups try to exploit the chaos. MeLaan provides crucial insights about kandra nature and their relationship with their god.
recaps.11: The investigation takes a personal turn as Bleeder seems to be specifically targeting people connected to Wax and his work. Security around key figures is increased.
recaps.12: TenSoon, an ancient kandra, arrives to provide information about their people's history and current crisis. The scope of the threat becomes clearer.
recaps.13: Labor strikes and political violence reach a peak as the city teeters on the edge of complete breakdown. Bleeder's true agenda begins to emerge.
recaps.14: Wax and Steris's relationship deepens as they face the crisis together. The investigation reveals disturbing connections between current events and past tragedies.
recaps.15: The team discovers crucial information about Bleeder's identity and motivations. Religious extremists complicate the situation further.
recaps.16: Mysterious Set operatives become involved, suggesting a larger conspiracy behind the chaos. The true scope of the threat to Elendel becomes apparent.
recaps.17: Personal revelations shake the investigation team as hidden connections between past and present are revealed. Bleeder's campaign escalates dramatically.
recaps.18: The crisis reaches a climax as political, religious, and criminal elements converge. Governor Innate faces impossible choices about the city's future.
recaps.19: Major revelations about the Set's involvement change everything the team thought they knew about the conspiracy threatening Elendel.
recaps.20: Harmony, the god of Scadrial, becomes directly involved as the true nature of the crisis threatens the world's balance. Ancient secrets are revealed.
recaps.21: Shocking truths about Bleeder's identity are revealed, connecting the current crisis to Wax's personal past in devastating ways.
recaps.22: The revelation of Paalm's true identity and her connection to Wax's past as Lessie transforms the entire nature of the conflict.
recaps.23: Wax confronts the impossible truth about Lessie's return and Paalm's motivations, forcing him to choose between past love and present duty.
recaps.24: The final confrontation approaches as all parties converge for a climactic battle that will determine Elendel's fate and resolve ancient conflicts.
recaps.25: The ultimate battle between Wax and Paalm takes place, testing everything he has learned about justice, love, and sacrifice.
recaps.26: In the aftermath of the crisis, Elendel begins to heal while new threats emerge. Wax and his allies prepare for future challenges while celebrating their victory.
